## RU: Ğ¡Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ User-Agent Ğ“ĞµĞ½ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Python

### âœ¨ Ğ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğµ

`Fake-random-userAgent` â€” ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ **Ğ»ĞµĞ³ĞºĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑĞ½Ğ°Ñ** Ğ¸ **ÑÑ„Ñ„ĞµĞºÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ½Ğ°Ñ** Python-Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞ° Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…, Ñ€ĞµĞ°Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğº **User-Agent**. ĞĞ½Ğ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞ¿ĞµÑ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ´ Ğ²ĞµĞ±-ÑĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¹Ğ¿Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ³Ğ°, Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ¸ Ñ‚ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ, Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ°Ñ Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¼ HTTP-Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ°Ğ¼ **Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ±ĞµĞ¶Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğº** Ğ¸ Ğ²Ñ‹Ğ³Ğ»ÑĞ´ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµÑÑ‚Ğ²ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾.

- **Ğ’ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ğ±Ğ°Ğ·Ğ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ…:** Ğ‘Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑˆĞ¸Ñ€Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼, Ğ²ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… (Ğ±Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞµ 10 000 Ğ°ĞºÑ‚ÑƒĞ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… User-Agent), Ğ¾Ñ…Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¸ Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°ÑƒĞ·ĞµÑ€Ñ‹ (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, iOS, Android Ğ¸ Ñ‚.Ğ´.).
- **ĞŸÑ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°:** Ğ—Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ĞºĞ° Ğ´Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ· Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ°.

#### ğŸ’¾ Ğ£ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ°

Ğ‘Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞ° Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· PyPI. Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ pip Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸:

```bash
    pip install fake-random-useragent
```

#### ğŸš€ Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ (Ğ‘Ñ‹ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ñ€Ñ‚)

Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒ Ğ¼Ğ°ĞºÑĞ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾. Ğ˜Ğ¼Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ UserAgent Ğ¸ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½ÑƒĞ¶Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ°.

```python
    from fake_random_useragent import UserAgent
    import requests

    ua = UserAgent()

    # 1. ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑĞ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° (Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾)
    print(f"Ğ¡Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ (ua.random): {ua.random}")
    # Ğ¢Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ±Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ°ĞµÑ‚: print(f"Ğ¡Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ (print(ua)): {ua}")

    # 2. ĞŸĞ¾Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ°Ğ³ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞºÑ€ĞµÑ‚Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°ÑƒĞ·ĞµÑ€Ñƒ/Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¿Ñƒ (Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°)
    print(f"Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Chrome: {ua.chrome}")
    print(f"Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ¯Ğ½Ğ´ĞµĞºÑ.Ğ‘Ñ€Ğ°ÑƒĞ·ĞµÑ€: {ua.yandex}")
    print(f"Ğ¢Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Desktop: {ua.desktop}")

    # 3. Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ² HTTP-Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞµ (ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€ Ñ Requests)
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': ua.get_random(browser='yandex', os='win')
    }
    response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/user-agent', headers=headers)
    print(f"\nUA, Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ½Ğ° ÑĞµÑ€Ğ²ĞµÑ€: {response.json()['user-agent']}")
```

#### âš™ï¸ Ğ”Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ€Ñ‹ Ğ¸ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°

A. Ğ¡Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ° (ĞŸÑ€ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ Ñ‡ĞµÑ€ĞµĞ· `ua.Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ`)

```
Ğ¡Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾	|  Ğ­ĞºĞ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ get_random()
â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“
ua.random	|  ua.get_random()
ua.desktop	|  ua.get_random(type='desktop')
ua.mobile	|  ua.get_random(type='mobile')
ua.chrome	|  ua.get_random(browser='chrome')
ua.firefox	|  ua.get_random(browser='firefox')
ua.safari	|  ua.get_random(browser='safari')
ua.yandex	|  ua.get_random(browser='yabrowser')
ua.windows	|  ua.get_random(os='windows')
ua.macos	|  ua.get_random(os='mac os x')
ua.android	|  ua.get_random(os='android')
```

B. ĞšĞ¾Ğ¼Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ (ua.get_random())

Ğ˜ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞ¹Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ´ get_random() Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ½ĞµÑĞºĞ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ğ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ñ€ĞµĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾. Ğ¤Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ±ĞºĞ¾Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ²Ğ¿Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ (Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑĞµÑ‚, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑĞ¾Ğ´ĞµÑ€Ğ¶Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑÑ Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğµ).

```
ĞŸĞ°Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñ€        | ĞĞ¿Ğ¸ÑĞ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ
â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”
browser         | ĞĞ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ±Ñ€Ğ°ÑƒĞ·ĞµÑ€Ğ°
os              | ĞĞ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ğ°Ñ ÑĞ¸ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¼Ğ°
type            | Ğ¢Ğ¸Ğ¿ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°
device_brand    | Ğ‘Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ´ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ°
os_version      | Ğ’ĞµÑ€ÑĞ¸Ñ ĞĞ¡
```

```python
# ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€: Chrome Ğ½Ğ° Android 14
agent = ua.get_random(browser='Chrome', os='Android', os_version='14')

# ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€: ĞœĞ¾Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Firefox Ğ½Ğ° iOS
agent = ua.get_random(browser='Firefox', os='iOS', type='mobile')
```

## EN: Random User-Agent Generator for Python

### âœ¨ About The Project

`Fake-random-userAgent` is a lightweight and flexible Python library for retrieving random, realistic User-Agent strings. It uses a comprehensive, built-in dataset to generate agents that help your HTTP requests avoid bot detection and appear legitimate.

With its flexible filtering system, you can easily retrieve an agent specific to a particular browser, operating system, or device type.

#### ğŸ’¾ Installation

The library is available on PyPI. Use pip to install it into your virtual environment:

```bash
    pip install fake-random-useragent
```

#### ğŸš€ Usage (Quick Start)

Using the library is straightforward. Import the UserAgent class and use its dynamic properties to get the desired agent.

```python
    from fake_random_useragent import UserAgent
    import requests

    ua = UserAgent()

    # 1. Get a completely random agent
    print(f"Random Agent (ua.random): {ua.random}")
    # Also works: print(f"Random Agent (print(ua)): {ua}")

    # 2. Get an agent by specific browser/type (dynamic properties)
    print(f"Only Firefox: {ua.firefox}")
    print(f"Only Safari: {ua.safari}")
    print(f"Only Mobile: {ua.mobile}")

    # 3. Use in an HTTP Request Example (with Requests)
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': ua.get_random(browser='yandex', os='win')
    }
    response = requests.get('https://httpbin.org/user-agent', headers=headers)
    print(f"\nUA sent to server: {response.json()['user-agent']}")
```

#### âš™ï¸ Available Filters and Properties

A. Properties (Direct access via ua.name)

```
Property	|  Equivalent get_random()
â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“
ua.random	|  ua.get_random()
ua.desktop	|  ua.get_random(type='desktop')
ua.mobile	|  ua.get_random(type='mobile')
ua.chrome	|  ua.get_random(browser='chrome')
ua.firefox	|  ua.get_random(browser='firefox')
ua.safari	|  ua.get_random(browser='safari')
ua.yandex	|  ua.get_random(browser='yabrowser')
ua.windows	|  ua.get_random(os='windows')
ua.macos	|  ua.get_random(os='mac os x')
ua.android	|  ua.get_random(os='android')
```

B. Combined Filtering (ua.get_random())

Use the get_random() method for precise targeting using multiple parameters simultaneously. Filtering uses soft matching (checks if the value is contained within the field).

```
Parameter	|   Description	Example
â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“â€“
browser         |   Browser name (Chrome, Firefox, YaBrowser, etc.)
os	        |   Operating System (Windows, iOS, Android, Mac OS X)
type	        |   Device type (desktop, mobile, tablet)
device_brand    |   Device manufacturer (Apple, Samsung, Huawei)
os_version	|   OS version (e.g., '14' for Android 14, '18' for iOS 18)
```

```python
    # Example: Yandex on Windows
    agent = ua.get_random(browser='Yandex', os='Windows')

    # Example: Mobile Chrome on Android 10
    agent = ua.get_random(browser='Chrome', os='Android', os_version='10', type='mobile')
```
